title: PreSTAR Pre-Submission Metadata
description: Structured metadata for FDA Pre-Submission meeting requests generated by /fda:presub command. v2.0 adds multi-pathway support (510k, PMA, IDE, De Novo).

generated_at.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when metadata was generated

regulatory_pathway.description: Regulatory pathway for the device (NEW in v2.0)

pathway_detection_method.description: How the regulatory pathway was determined (NEW in v2.0)

pathway_rationale.description: Explanation for why this pathway was selected (NEW in v2.0)

detection_method.description: How the meeting type was determined

detection_rationale.description: Explanation for why this meeting type was selected

product_code.description: FDA product code for the device (e.g., DQY, OVE)

intended_use.description: Intended use statement / indications for use

device_class.description: FDA device class (1, 2, or 3) (NEW in v2.0)

questions_generated.description: List of question IDs selected for this Pre-Sub

items.description: Question ID (e.g., PRED-001, TEST-BIO-001, PMA-CLINICAL-001, IDE-SR-NSR-001, DENOVO-RISK-001)

fda_form.description: FDA form number for PreSTAR XML

expected_timeline_days.description: Expected FDA response timeline in days

auto_triggers_fired.description: List of auto-triggers that matched device characteristics

data_sources_used.description: Data sources queried for template population

metadata.description: Additional metadata about the generation process

placeholder_count.description: Number of TODO placeholders in generated presub_plan.md

auto_filled_fields.description: List of fields successfully auto-populated from project data

question_bank_version.description: Version of the question bank used (NEW in v2.0)

pathway_specific_questions.description: Number of pathway-specific questions included (NEW in v2.0)
